aboutApp: Managing a team to success requires more than just simply appointing tasks to people. A crucial role in cultivating business growth, being in charge of team management requires a fusion of interpersonal, technical, and of course, organizational skills.
aboutAppAdd: Get Better Business Results by Investing Time in Building Team with Project Management Application PMS
course: This Application was developed as a final project of the 6-months Front-end Course at RS School. Project management system is an App that helps an individual in a team or group of developers achieve their goals. The Application was coded using Angular framework.
author: Hi! I am a front-end developer, with love and passion doing my work. I have an experience of making web-sites and applications with implementation of API and Angular framework. More info about me and my projects you can find at the link below. Any feedback is highly appreciated
